Uses of Class
com.picocontainer.parameters.MethodParameters

  • Packages that use MethodParameters 
    Package Description
    com.picocontainer
    This package contains the core API for PicoContainer, a compact container for working with the dependency injection pattern.
    com.picocontainer.behaviors
    BehaviorFactories make Behaviors which change aspects of component implementations and instances.
    com.picocontainer.containers
    Containers are the main user entry point for PicoContainer.
    com.picocontainer.injectors
    InjectionFactories make Injectors which implement specific types of dependency injection.
    com.picocontainer.parameters
    In the PicoContainer API, Parameters are used for specifying which constructor argument (or setter argument) goes where.
    com.picocontainer.security

    • Uses of MethodParameters in com.picocontainer.parameters

      Subclasses of MethodParameters in com.picocontainer.parameters 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeanParameters
      Parameter where the name is the bean property name, and this class automatically converts the name to the setter method it is looking for.
